title: Calzone with roasted peppers
ingredients: ['2 red peppers, halved and seeded', '1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '1 large onion, sliced', '3 garlic cloves, crushed', '300 g (10 1/2 oz) skinless boneless chicken breasts (fillets), diced', '12 sun-dried tomato halves packed in oil, drained and chopped', '4 tbsp chopped fresh basil', '12 stoned black olives, halved', '1 packet pizza base mix, about 290 g', '150 g (5 1/2 oz) mozzarella cheese, diced', '1 egg, beaten', '1 tbsp sesame seeds', 'salt and pepper']
